name: Go, Diego, Go! Great Dinosaur Rescue
synopsis: Go, Diego, Go: Great Dinosaur Rescue lets gamers travel through time with Diego, Alicia, and Baby Jaguar to reunite their friend Maia the Maiasaura with her dinosaur family. Players use more than 12 different actions to stomp like a dinosaur, climb across monkey bars, fly on a Pteradon, and bounce over obstacles on a pogo stick.
